name: You're the Dice, Ruin the Game
name_original: You're the Dice, Ruin the Game
description:
You're the Dice, Ruin the Game!

In this silly game YOU are the D20 holding power over critical success or a critical fail. Your goal: disrupt the game as MUCH AS YOU CAN. Will you roll a critical one and destroy half the playtable in the process? Or will you use the law of physics to roll in a poor players eye for bonus points? Try to score as highly as possible in each of the levels.

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. Enjoy the chaos!
